author: dcampbell@businessinsider.com (Dakin Campbell), Dakin Campbell
title: From turrets to Zoom, insiders explain how Wall Street is making an unprecedented switch to trading from home
description: Simon Dawson/REUTERS; Samantha Lee/Business Insider Much of Wall Street's trading force is now working from home. But trading remotely comes with disadvantages. "Trading from home has never been done," a trading at exec at one of the biggest banks told Busine…
content:
It was unthinkable a little over a month ago: Legions of Wall Street traders navigating the most chaotic market in their lifetimes from the comfort of their living rooms. 
With the spread of the novel coronavirus and increasing restrictions from governments … [+1639 chars]
